title: Earmuffs Arrangement
detail_text: <:th_ch0002/>My, Kasumi. What lovely earmuffs you’re wearing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ehehe~, they’re super cute, aren’t they? Plus, with them on, Kasumin looks even more adorable, right~!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, yeah. You also look really cute, Kasumi.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Exactly! Kasumin is cute!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Ah, that’s right. Try this on.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>? Waaah, a lace handkerchief! This looks really pretty, Eli-senpai! But what should Kasumin do with this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Look, if you tie it like a ribbon to your earmuffs.... There, you look even cuter now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kyaaaah~! Wuv you, Eli-senpai~! Ah, since we’re doing this, try putting it on too, Eli-senpai! ....Yeah, it looks good on you! Not more than me, though!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I-, I’m good. This kind of thing fits you more, Kasumi.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Of course it would, but you also look adorable like this, Eli-senpai!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
